text: wawassayna l-insana biwalidayhi ih'sanan hamalathu ummuhu kur'han wawadaʿathu kur'han wahamluhu wafisaluhu thalathuna shahran hatta idha balagha ashuddahu wabalagha arbaʿina sanatan qala rabbi awziʿ'ni an ashkura niʿ'mataka allati anʿamta ʿalayya waʿala walidayya wa-an aʿmala salihan tardahu wa-aslih li fi dhurriyyati inni tub'tu ilayka wa-inni mina l-mus'limina
